dance.cancelAddPlay: Are you sure you want to cancel subscribing to {{musicName}}?

info.avatarDescription: Customize your avatar. Click to upload
info.coverDescription: Used for displaying the character on the discovery page. Recommended size {{width}} x {{height}}
info.descDescription: Character description, used for a brief introduction
info.emotionDescription: Select the emotion when responding, which will affect the character's expression
info.genderDescription: Character gender, affects character's touch response
info.greetDescription: Greeting used when chatting with the character for the first time
info.modelDescription: Model preview, drag and drop the model file to replace
info.nameDescription: Character name, used when chatting with the character
info.readmeDescription: Character's description file, used for detailed introduction on the discovery page

role.greetTip: Enter the greeting used by the character when greeting you
role.roleSettingDescription: Character's background settings, will be sent to the model when chatting with the character
role.uploadSize: Supports uploading a single file, recommended size is a multiple of {{width}} x {{height}}

touch.inputActionEmotion: Enter the character's expression when responding

tts.auditionDescription: Audition text varies depending on the language
tts.engineDescription: Speech synthesis engine, it is recommended to choose Edge browser first
tts.localeDescription: Language used for speech synthesis, currently only supports several common languages. Please contact us if you need more
tts.pitchDescription: Control the pitch, range is 0 ~ 2, default is 1
tts.speedDescription: Control the speed, range is 0 ~ 3, default is 1
tts.voiceDescription: Different depending on the engine and language

upload.support: Supports uploading a single file, currently only supports vrm format files
